sense.gloss: spread (e.g. of a disease), rampancy, infestation, proliferation, being widespread
creeping plant, creeper, vine, liana, liane
bow, temple arm, sidepiece, lug arm, earpiece, part of a pair of glasses that goes over the ear
to become overgrown, to grow thick
to spread, to run rampant, to thrive, to prevail, to become powerful
running ground pine (species of club moss, Lycopodium clavatum)
jiaogulan (species of herbaceous vine; Gynostemma pentaphyllum)

sdata.j: その↑病気↑↓びょうき↓は↑蔓延↑↓まんえん↓しつつあるようだ。
sdata.e: It is said that the disease has been spreading.

sdata.j: ジカウイルスは↑中南米↑↓ちゅうなんべい↓で↑急速↑↓きゅうそく↓に↑蔓延↑↓まんえん↓した。
sdata.e: The Zika virus spread rapidly across central and south America.

words.gloss: spread (e.g. of a disease), rampancy, infestation, proliferation, being widespread
creeping plant, creeper, vine, liana, liane
